# coexnetwork

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Nowadays, the way to create a coexpression network is to use Hierarchical Clustering. This package allows you to create a coexpression network using the glmnet algorithm. In addition, the network created will be relative to a covariate of the sample to be studied.

## Installation

You can install coexnetwork like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("carmen-maria-hernandez/coexnetwork")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(coexnetwork)
## basic example code
```
